name: uikit
description: UIKit provides accessible, themeable UI components for building web applications.

members.name: Button
members.summary: A clickable button element with variants
members.description: The Button component renders a styled button with support for primary, secondary, and outline variants. Supports disabled state and loading indicators.

members.name: Card
members.summary: A content container with optional header and footer
members.description: Cards group related content and actions. Use card-header, card-body, and card-footer for structured layouts.

members.name: Modal
members.summary: An overlay dialog for focused interactions
members.description: Modal displays content in a layer above the page. Requires explicit open/close handling. Traps focus when open for accessibility.

parameters.name: closable
parameters.description: Allow closing via backdrop click or Escape key

members.name: Badge
members.summary: A small label for status or counts

guides.title: Color System
guides.summary: How UIKit theming and colors work

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: UIKit uses CSS custom properties for theming. All components reference semantic color tokens like `--color-primary` and `--color-surface`.

sections.title: Customization
sections.content: Override colors by setting CSS custom properties on the `:root` selector or any parent element for scoped theming.
